--- title: "Data Wrangling" author: "Miguel PeÃ±ate" date: "2024-05-22" format: html: code-fold: true self-contained: false --- >Data wrangling (Cleaning & Preparation) is the important process of preparing data for analysis and the foundation of exploratory data analysis. In this section we will work with the data about: [Patents](https://cloud.tuhh.de/index.php/s/sGZKmdfLfdZBFK9) ### QUESTION 1 "The table shows the top 10 US companies with the most assigned/granted patents." ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/plot_6e52ae90f22f9c894ea172d865cccf0a'} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}

````` ::: ::: --- ### QUESTION 2 "The table lists the top 10 US companies with the most new granted patents for August 2014" ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_57673931551f9dd5cee7e11cb006c61d'} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
